cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the problem of secure distributed data storage, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR). The use of coding schemes for distributed storage also falls under the category of distributed computing (cs.DC) and distributed systems (cs.DS). Finally, the paper discusses the security properties of the proposed construction, which is relevant to the field of security and privacy (cs.SI).
